bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a swelling rising on both foot soles. On top of it it develops sores like a black bean. It is hard like a metal pin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu zi 附子 quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 足釘 怪疾：兩足心凸腫，上生黑豆瘡，硬如釘，脛骨生碎孔，髓流出，身發 寒顫，惟思飲酒 , “The strange illness of foot pin : On the soles of both feet a swelling emerges. On top of it there grow sores like a black bean. They are as hard as a nail. The shinbones turn brittle and develop holes from which marrow is released. The body shivers from cold. [Patients] have but one desire: to drink wine”.
